Fødselsnummer / D-nummer.value: Norwegian national identification number / D number

Jeg legger det ved denne søknaden (anbef.value: I will attach it to this application (recommended).

Ja, jeg legger det ved denne søknaden..value: Yes, I will attach it to this application.

Nei, jeg har ingen ekstra dokumentasjon.value: No, I have no additional documentation I want to submit.

Har du noen annen dokumentasjon du ønske.value: Do you have any other documentation you want to submit?

Har du annen dokumentasjon du ønsker å l.value: Do you have other documentation you want to submit?

Vi trenger følgende dokumentasjon for å.value: We need the following documentation to process your application:

Jeg ettersender dokumentasjonen senere (.value: I will send the documentation later (I am aware that NAV can not process the application until I have submitted the documentation).

Har du norsk fødselsnummer eller D-numme.value: Do you have a Norwegian national identification number / D number?

Er kontaktadressen din en vegadresse ell.value: Is your contact address a street address or PO box address?

Vegnavn og husnummer, evt. postboks.value: Street name and house number, or PO box

Fra hvilken dato skal denne adressen bru.value: From what date should this address be used (dd.mm.yyyy)?

Til hvilken dato skal denne adressen bru.value: To what date should this address be used (dd.mm.yyyy)?

Du velger selv hvor lenge adressen skal.value: You choose for how long the address will be valid, a maximum of 1 year. After 1 year, you must change or extend the address.

NAV sender svar på søknad og annen kommu.value:
NAV sends answers to applications and other communication to your registered address.
You can check and change your registered address on the tax administration's website (opens in a new window) . If you wish to receive communication from NAV at an address other than your registered address, you can use the link above to enter a postal address in the National Register. You can also find a paper form for changing the postal address on the same page at the Tax Agency.

Velg det alternativet som gjelder deg.value: Choose the alternative that applies to you

Jeg har levert denne dokumentasjonen tid.value: I have provided this documentation before

NAV tar kontakt med deg hvis vi ikke har.value: NAV will contact you if we do not have all the documentation we need.

Jeg legger det ved denne søknaden (anbef.value: I will attach it to this application (recommended)

Jeg ettersender dokumentasjonen senere (.value: I will send the documentation later (I am aware that NAV can not process the application until I have submitted the documentation)

Jeg ettersender dokumentasjonen senere..value: I will forward the documentation later.

error.value: To proceed, you must correct the following:

invalid_email.value: {{field}} must be a valid email address.

noIBANCountry.value: The IBAN contains an invalid country code (should be two capital letters at the start of the code)

checksumNotNumber.value: The IBAN is invalid because the checksum is not a number

wrongIBANChecksum.value: The IBAN has an incorrect checksum. Make sure you have entered it correctly.

invalidIBAN.value: The IBAN is invalid. Make sure you have entered it correctly.

fodselsnummerDNummer.value: This is not a valid Norwegian national identification number / D number

dateNotBeforeFromDate.value: The date cannot be earlier than {{fromDate}}

dateAfterFromDate.value: The date must be later than {{fromDate}}

dateNotBeforeAllowedDate.value: The date can not be earlier than

dateInBetween.value: Date cannot be earlier than {{minDate}} or later than {{maxDate}}

dateNotLaterThanAllowedDate.value: The date can not be later than

For å gå videre må du rette opp følgende.value: To proceed, you must correct the following:

Last ned og skriv ut dokumentene til sak.value: Download and print the documents for your case

Vennligst sjekk at alle svarene dine er.value: Please check that all your answers are correct. If you find something that needs to be corrected, press "{{editAnswers}}" at the bottom of this page. If all the answers are correct, proceed to step 2.

Førstesidearket inneholder viktig inform.value: The cover sheet contains important information about the NAV unit that will receive the documents and the address to which the documents should be sent.

Send det hele til NAV i posten.value: Send it all to NAV in the mail

Følg instruksjonene på førstesidearket f.value: Follow the instructions on the cover sheet  to send the documents in the mail.

Du hører fra oss så fort vi har sett på.value: You will hear from oss as soon as we have processed your case. We will contact you if anything is missing.

1. Last ned den ferdig utfylte søknaden.value: " 1. Download the completed application to your device"

Klikk på «{{downloadApplication}}». Da å.value: Click "{{downloadApplication}}". This will open your completed application in a new tab in the browser.

Du må lagre søknaden (PDF) på enheten di.value: You need to save the application (PDF) on your device so that you can easily find it again.

Etter at du har lastet ned og lagret søk.value: After you have downloaded and saved your application, you must upload it to NAV. Follow the instructions in point 2 further down this page.

Når du klikker på «Gå videre» åpnes det.value: When you click on "Proceed", a new page will open (login required) where you will upload your application.

På neste side laster du opp søknaden sli.value: On the next page, upload the application as follows:

Hopp over trinn 1 «Forbered skjema» og g.value: Skip step 1 «Forbered skjema» and proceed directly to step 2 «Last opp skjema».

Trykk på «Finn filen» og last opp søknad.value: Click "Finn filen" and upload the application that you saved on your device.

Deretter må du laste opp eventuelle vedl.value: Then you need to upload any attachments. Click on "Bekreft" to proceed to submitting the application. Click the "Send til NAV" button at the bottom of the page to submit your application.

Du må bekrefte at du har lest instruksjo.value: You must confirm that you have read the instructions above before proceeding.

Du må laste ned søknaden din før du kan.value: You must download your application before you can proceed.

Vennligst sjekk at alle opplysningene di.value: Please check that all your information is correct. If you find something that needs to be corrected, click on "{{editAnswers}}" at the bottom of this page. If all the information is correct, go to point 2.

Velg enhet som skal behandle saken din.value: Select the NAV unit that will process your case

Du må velge enheten som skal behandle sa.value: You must select the NAV unit that will process your case

Førsteside kan ikke genereres før du har.value: The cover sheet cannot be generated until you have selected the NAV unit that will process your case

En feil har oppstått. Vi kunne ikke last.value: An error has occured. We could not load the NAV units. Sorry for the inconvenience, please try again later.

Klikk på «{{downloadApplication}}». Da å.value: Click "{{downloadApplication}}". This will open the completed document in a new tab in the browser.

Etter at du har lastet ned og lagret dok.value: After you have downloaded and saved the document, you must upload it to NAV. Follow the instructions in point 2 below.

Når du klikker på «Gå videre» åpnes det.value: When you click on "Proceed", a new page will open (requires login) where you can upload the document.

På neste side laster du opp dokumentet s.value: On the next page, upload the document as follows:

Trykk på «Finn filen» og last opp dokume.value: Press "Finn filen" and upload the document that you saved to your device.

Deretter må du laste opp eventuelle vedl.value: Then you need to upload any attachments. Press "Bekreft" to proceed to submitting the documents. Press the "Send til NAV" button at the bottom of the page to send the documents to NAV.

Du må laste ned det utfylte dokumentet f.value: You must download the completed document before you can proceed.

1. Last ned det ferdig utfylte dokumente.value: 1. Download the completed document to your device

Du må lagre dokumentet (PDF) på enheten.value: You need to save the document (PDF) on your device so that you can easily find it again.

Vennligst sjekk at alle opplysningene di.value: Please check that all your information is correct. If you find something that needs to be corrected, click on "{{editAnswers}}" at the bottom of this page. If all the information is correct, go to the next step.

Er du sikker på at du vil avbryte?.value: Are you sure you want to cancel?
